    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932434">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932434">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932434">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932434">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Rachel Hamelers
           <br />
           phone: x 3601
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932434" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932507">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932507">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932507">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text!
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932507">
          <p>
           When searching for articles, you may find the
           <strong>
            full-text
           </strong>
           of an article
           <strong>
            linked
           </strong>
           in the database. If not:
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Most databases have a
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons. Click the link to check our holdings.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            If there is not a&nbsp;
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons,
            <strong>
             search
             <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
              Encompass
             </a>
            </strong>
            to see if we have access to the full text in print or through another database.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           If we do not have access to the article you need,
           <strong>
            request
           </strong>
           the article via
           <strong>
            Interlibrary Loan
           </strong>
           :
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases have a
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request on Interlibrary Loan
             </em>
            </strong>
            or
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request Item
             </em>
            </strong>
            link or button. Click here to fill out a request form.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If the database does not have an ILL link embedded, go to the Library Homepage -- Services --
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
             Interlibrary Loan
            </a>
            . Fill out the form. NOTE: Interlibrary Loan can take anywhere from a few day to a few weeks. Plan accordingly.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt16932507" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932480">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932480">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932480">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932480">
          <p>
           <strong>
            TREXLER LIBRARY and LIBRARIES WORLDWIDE
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           Search
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
            Encompass
           </a>
           to find out what books, government publications, journals, videos, etc. you can access through Trexler Library, as well as to see items that other libraries own that may be accessible to you through
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            Interlibrary Loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932480" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932435">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932435">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932435">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932435">
          <div id="boxatt16932435" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19974045">
              <a id="link_19974045" href="http://0-search.credoreference.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974045,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974045}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Credo Reference provides access to 325 reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from over 60 respected publishers across 17 major subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974047">
              <a id="link_19974047" href="http://0-www.els.net.library.muhlenberg.edu/WileyCDA/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974047,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974047}); ">
               Encyclopedia of life sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (1999- ). Basingstoke, Hampshire, England: Nature Pub. Group: Macmillan; New York, NY: Grove's Dictionaries, Inc.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974048">
              Levin, S.A. (Ed.). (2001). Encyclopedia of biodiversity. San Diego, CA: Academic Press.
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reference 333.9503 E56o v.1-5
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932436">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932436">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932436">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Specific sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932436">
          <div id="boxatt16932436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19974053">
              <a id="link_19974053" href="http://ngm.nationalgeographic.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974053,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974053}); ">
               National Geographic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available through the publisher, full text from publisher, 2005 - present, or 1995 - 3 months ago through Academic Search Complete
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974057">
              <a id="link_19974057" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/detail?sid=38a2e7e5-e749-45d5-91a8-10b7dc75dd04%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112&amp;bdata=JnNpdGU9ZWhvc3QtbGl2ZSZzY29wZT1zaXRl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974057,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974057}); ">
               Nature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available through Academic Search Complete, 1997-1 year ago, or in paper on level C
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974060">
              <a id="link_19974060" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/detail?sid=5ed450a8-9246-469f-a601-13f832c701b4%40sessionmgr4003&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112&amp;bdata=JnNpdGU9ZWhvc3QtbGl2ZSZzY29wZT1zaXRl#db=aph&amp;jid=NHI" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974060,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974060}); ">
               Natural History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available through Academic Search Complete, 1990 - present, or on level C in paper
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974065">
              <a id="link_19974065" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/detail?sid=ae717427-6b15-42c8-9fcc-ede886b5817f%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112&amp;bdata=JnNpdGU9ZWhvc3QtbGl2ZSZzY29wZT1zaXRl#db=aph&amp;jid=SCI" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974065,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974065}); ">
               Science
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available in paper on level C of the library, 1966-present, citations are available through Academic Search Complete
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974067">
              <a id="link_19974067" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/detail?sid=5c6e8b06-1e0b-4ea3-9724-d42c604d91a0%40sessionmgr4003&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112&amp;bdata=JnNpdGU9ZWhvc3QtbGl2ZSZzY29wZT1zaXRl#db=aph&amp;jid=SIA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974067,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974067}); ">
               Scientific American
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available from Academic Search Complete, 1995-present
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>

       <div id="wrapbox16932437">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932437">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932437">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Databases - Getting Started
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932437">
          <div id="boxatt16932437" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19974000">
              <a id="link_19974000" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974000,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Large and diverse database that covers most academic disciplines. Contains both scholarly and non-academic resources. Includes many articles in full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974001">
              <a id="link_19974001" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974001,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Searchable collections of full-text journals across many disciplines. Contains full-text of many biology, botany, ecology journal titles. (Note: To restrict results to particular journals/disciplines, from Advanced Search screen, choose discipline category/ies.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974071">
              <a id="link_19974071" href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/hottopics/lnacademic/?" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974071,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974071}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides access to news articles, business legal information, medical and reference research. The News includes national, regional, and international newspapers and magazines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974072">
              <a id="link_19974072" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/advanced?sid=598a2239-0fec-45f7-bcff-e7ebc48e2b7c%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974072,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974072}); ">
               OmniFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Multi-disciplinary database providing the complete content--indexing, abstracts, and full-text--from six of Wilson's full-text databases.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932438">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932438">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932438">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Primary Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932438">
          <p>
           Reading Primary Literature in Biology (Kenyon College)
           <br />
           <a href="http://biology.kenyon.edu/Bio_InfoLit/index.html">
            http://biology.kenyon.edu/Bio_InfoLit/index.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="font-weight: bold;">
           Article Databases and Indexes
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932438" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19974073">
              <a id="link_19974073" href="http://agricola.nal.usda.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974073,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974073}); ">
               Agricola
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A bibliographic database of citations to agricultural literature created by the National Agricultural Library. It contains separate databases for books and journals which combined account for millions of records from 1970 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974075">
              <a id="link_19974075" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974075,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974075}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access search engine that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly" on the free web. Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Be sure to check library catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974076">
              <a id="link_19974076" href="http://0-www.ingentaconnect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974076,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974076}); ">
               Ingenta
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides online indexing to professional and scholarly publications. Researchers are able to search and access a broad range of academic materials relevant to biology, life sciences, as well as many other subject areas. No full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19974078">
              <a id="link_19974078" href="http://0-www.sciencedirect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19974078,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Animal Behavior ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974078}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This database includes 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health and life sciences. Coverage spans 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4605728" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16932439">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932439">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932439">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932439">
          <p dir="ltr">
           For
           <strong>
            information
           </strong>
           on citation styles, consult the following resources.
          </p>
          <p dir="ltr">
           Writer's Handbook (University of Wisconsin--Madison)
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/Documentation.html">
            http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/Documentation.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           Trexler Library handouts on citation styles:
           <br />
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932439" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16932440">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16932440">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16932440">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932440">
          <p>
           Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           by filling out the appropriate form for
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
            articles
           </a>
           or
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=book">
            books
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932440" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
